# samsungcloudplatformv2_vpc_peering (Data Source)

vpc peering detail.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_vpc_peering" "vpc" {
        id = var.id
}


output "vpcs_peering" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_vpc_peering.vpc
}

variable "id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```
